title: ELECTROMAGNETIC THEORY
description:
Cat. I
 
A continuation of PH 2301, this course deals with more advanced subjects in
electromagnetism, as well as the study of basic subjects with a more advanced level
 of mathematical analysis. Fundamentals of electric and magnetic fields, dielectric
 and magnetic properties of matter, quasi-static time-dependent phenomena, and
 generation and propagation of electromagnetic waves are investigated from the 
point of view of the classical Maxwell's equations.
